site.title: Stand Against Deportation
site.description: Opposing U.S. deportation policies that violate due process rights

hero.title: Stand Against Deportation
hero.description: We oppose U.S. deportation policies that violate due process rights and tear families apart. Join our movement to advocate for fair and humane immigration policies.

petitions.title: Sign Petitions
petitions.description: This petition calls for immediate action to stop unjust deportations that violate due process rights. Your signature matters in our fight for justice.

forum.title: Discussion Forum
forum.description: Join the conversation about immigration rights and due process. Share your thoughts, experiences, and ideas for action.

volunteer.title: Volunteer Opportunities
volunteer.description: We need your help to make a difference. Sign up to volunteer for our campaigns, events, and advocacy efforts.

share.title: Share Our Message
share.description: Help spread the word about our mission and the importance of due process in immigration.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Stand Against Deportation is a coalition of advocates, lawyers, and community members dedicated to opposing U.S. deportation policies that violate due process rights. We believe in fair and humane treatment for all individuals in the immigration system.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.description: We work with a network of organizations committed to immigration justice and human rights.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions or want to get involved? Reach out to our team.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: This Privacy Policy describes how Stand Against Deportation collects, uses, and shares your personal information when you use our website.

information.title: Information We Collect
information.description: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you sign a petition, contact a legislator, or sign up to volunteer.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.description: We use your information to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, and comply with legal obligations.

sharing.title: How We Share Your Information
sharing.description: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with service providers, partners, and as required by law.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.description: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. Contact us to exercise these rights.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@standagainstdeportation.org.
